originalText.text: Wave and his staff are always pleasant and willing to help no matter the issue. I found Wave through a family member a few years ago and even though I moved to Florida, I still use him to this day. He completes my taxes both professionally and personally. If I have any questions, tax season or not, he answers the call or email. He always makes himself available to take my questions and provides advice!! Thank you Wave, keep up the excellent work!!!

originalText.text: Do not go here. The previous owner/business (Newkirk & associates) were reputable and did a great job. I had been using both, for almost 10 years- Once it changed hands and names, it is no longer either. I waited 3 months for Waverly to eventually get around to filing- all along, telling you they’re getting to it, and stringing you along so you don’t go elsewhere. He will put your return into extension, without being instructed to do so. When you go to a CPA you are paying for a service, not asking for a favor. If you’re going to pay to get your taxes done, go elsewhere, or you’ll pay in more ways than one.

originalText.text: I have been dealing with Harlem tax since 2011. I have to say Harlem tax is the most knowledgeable Tax accounting firm, I have ever dealt with. Honestly if I could give this company 10 stars I would. this firm knows all tax laws and is the most professional I have ever seen. They deal with everything for me and I know if I needed anything, I could rely on this company to get me through anything! Thank you Harlem tax for all the excellent work you have done for my company! Hands down the best TAX ACCOUNTING FIRM in Harlem and New York City!!!
